channel.title: MINDNIGHT - FM Edition Hippo technically wins!
channel.description:
####
[color=dPurple] Introduction: [/color]
- Hello and welcome to this unsual mini FM! What is it? It's a basically a concept relied on original game with same name that has been changed with minor changes. There is Agents (Town), Hackers (Mafia) and unofficial role made by myself - Double Agent (Neutral). - This game is a test of your scum-reading skills. Do you think you have what need to take a win? ###
[color=dPurple] Rules: [/color]
1. No gamethrowing. 2. No editing messages. 3. No private messaging with others in the game about the game. 4. Don't show your role card to anyone without permission from the Host. 5. Be active! After 24 hours you will be probbed and if you don't answer, you would be replaced/modkilled. 6. Most importantly have fun! After all this is why you're here. 7. Breaking any of those rules will be effective in a warming and next attempts would be follow up by potential modkill. ##
[color=dPurple] Gameplay: [/color]
- There is 3 rounds. People on 1st, 2st and 3rd place with most points will win the game. - This game is nightless. The round will be over after accepting 5 Nodes teams. - Actions are done by DM me in role card. - Hackers **don't** have a separate chat. - After receiving a role card, you will have 24 hours to reply, confirming you have received it. - After rejecting 5 Node Teams in one session, Hackers will automaticly win. - After winning Agents gain 2 points, Hackers 3 points and DA 4 points ##
[color=dPurple] Choosing Phase: [/color]
- To choose a player to Node Team write **/pick [Name] in thread**. You have 4.5 hours. - You can pick specific people required to the team including yourself. - You can either accept or reject the current Node Team by DM'ing in PM. - There is an option pass to another player by writing **/pass**. ##
[color=dPurple] How to Join: [/color]
- Just say something like "/join", "in" or whatever you want to express your interest in joining. ##
[color=dPurple] Role Cards: [/color]
[details="Summary"] > ### [color=Green]Agent[/color] >**Antivirus** - Install a program that will work against hacking attacks. *Secure at least 3 Nodes.* > ### [color=Green]Admin[/color] >_You can see who are the Hackers and Double Agent_ >**Antivirus** - Install a program that will work against hacking attacks. *Secure at least 3 Nodes and don't let hackers to identify you.* > ### [color=Red]Hacker[/color] >*You know who are your teammates.* >**Antivirus** - Install a program that will work against hacking attacks. **Hacking Tool** - Break the code and prevent the Antivirus from installing. However your presence will be detected. *Hack at least 3 Nodes or successfully identify the Admin.* > ### [color=Red]Nuker[/color] >*You know who are your teammates. You can identify Admin if 3 Nodes would be secured* >**Antivirus** - Install a program that will work against hacking attacks. **Hacking Tool** - Break the code and prevent the Antivirus from installing. However your presence will be detected. *Hack at least 3 Nodes or successfully identify the Admin.* > ### [color=Grey]Double Agent[/color] >*Every even choice would be opposite to the first one.* >**Antivirus** - Install a program that will work against hacking attacks. **Hacking Tool** - Break the code and prevent the Antivirus from installing. However your presence will be detected. *Be in at least 3 accepted Node Teams.* [/details] ###
[color=dPurple] Standart Rolelist: [/color]
- [color=Green] Agent[/color] [color=Green] Agent[/color] [color=Green] Agent[/color] [color=Green] Agent[/color] [color=Red] Hacker[/color] [color=Red] Hacker[/color] [color=Grey] Double Agent[/color] ###
[color=dPurple] Mainframe Rolelist: [/color]
- [color=Green] Admin[/color] [color=Green] Agent[/color] [color=Green] Agent[/color] [color=Red] Hacker[/color] [color=Red] Nuker[/color] #####
[color=dPurple] Node Combinations: [/color]
Node 1 - 2 People
Node 2 - 3 People
Node 3 - 2 People
Node 4 - 3 People
Node 5 - 3 People #####
[color=dPurple] Playerlist/Scoreboard: [/color]
1. Marluxion - 0 Points 2. MaximusPrime- 5 Points 3. Hippolytus- 6 Points 4. CaptainNerbins - 2 Points 5. Whammerist - 4 Points 6. Pug - 2 Points 7. Celeste_Ludenberg - 3 Points #####
[color=dPurple] Timelaps: [/color]
